overview:
14 years experience in finance including 6 years in venture capital fund management sector.

Financial Controller, Springboard-Harper Investment Pte Ltd

Assistant Finance Manager, Vertex Management (II) Pte Ltd (the venture capital arm of Singapore Technologies Group). Reports to VP (Finance), Ms Yap was responsible for the finance and tax planning for the consolidated Fund Management Group. Vertex Group managed and co-managed venture capital funds totaling US$1b.
